sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Button from './Button'
import ButtonGroup from '../ButtonGroup'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#button"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={0} __code={`<Button label="Default Button" />`} __scope={{props,Button,ButtonGroup}}>
  <Button label="Default Button"/>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Button} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"variations"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#variations"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Variations`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"flat-button"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#flat-button"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Flat Button`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={`<ButtonGroup>
  <Button label="primary" type="primary" />
  <Button label="secondary" type="secondary" />
  <Button label="success" type="success" />
  <Button label="danger" type="danger" />
  <Button label="warning" type="warning" />
  <Button label="info" type="info" />
</ButtonGroup>`} __scope={{props,Button,ButtonGroup}}>
  <ButtonGroup>
    <Button label="primary" type="primary"/>
    <Button label="secondary" type="secondary"/>
    <Button label="success" type="success"/>
    <Button label="danger" type="danger"/>
    <Button label="warning" type="warning"/>
    <Button label="info" type="info"/>
  </ButtonGroup>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"inverted-button"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#inverted-button"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Inverted Button`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __code={`<ButtonGroup>
  <Button inverted label="primary" type="primary" />
  <Button inverted label="secondary" type="secondary" />
  <Button inverted label="success" type="success" />
  <Button inverted label="danger" type="danger" />
  <Button inverted label="warning" type="warning" />
  <Button inverted label="info" type="info" />
</ButtonGroup>`} __scope={{props,Button,ButtonGroup}}>
  <ButtonGroup>
    <Button inverted label="primary" type="primary"/>
    <Button inverted label="secondary" type="secondary"/>
    <Button inverted label="success" type="success"/>
    <Button inverted label="danger" type="danger"/>
    <Button inverted label="warning" type="warning"/>
    <Button inverted label="info" type="info"/>
  </ButtonGroup>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"corners"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#corners"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Corners`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={4} __code={`<ButtonGroup>
  <Button corners="pill" label="Pill" type="primary" />
  <Button corners="rounded" label="Rounded" type="secondary" />
</ButtonGroup>`} __scope={{props,Button,ButtonGroup}}>
  <ButtonGroup>
    <Button corners="pill" label="Pill" type="primary"/>
    <Button corners="rounded" label="Rounded" type="secondary"/>
  </ButtonGroup>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"sizes"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#sizes"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Sizes`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={5} __code={`<Button size="small" label="Small" type="primary" />
<Button label="Medium" type="primary" />
<Button size="large" label="Large" type="primary" />`} __scope={{props,Button,ButtonGroup}}>
  <Button size="small" label="Small" type="primary"/>
  <Button label="Medium" type="primary"/>
  <Button size="large" label="Large" type="primary"/>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"fluid"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h4" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#fluid"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Fluid`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={6} __code={`<Button fluid label="Fluid Button" type="primary" />`} __scope={{props,Button,ButtonGroup}}>
  <Button fluid label="Fluid Button" type="primary"/>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"theme-config-props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#theme-config-props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Theme config props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`These configs applies to all Button elements on the application`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`// Defines Buttons size
buttonSize:  @Number - [Default: 10]

//Defines Button font size
buttonFontSize:  @Number - [Default: 12]

//Defines primary Button font color
primaryButtonFontColor:  @String - [Default: '#fff']

//Defines secondary Button border size
secondaryButtonFontColor:  @String - [Default: '#fff']

//Defines if Buttons have uppercase font
buttonUppercaseFont:  @Boolean - [Default: true]
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
